parts.text:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>Subject: Regarding Your Recent Inquiry/Claim - [Claim Number or Inquiry Topic]

Dear [Customer Name],

This memo is to follow up on your recent inquiry regarding [briefly state the inquiry topic] or your claim, [Claim Number], submitted on [Date].

[Choose ONE of the following options and customize it based on the situation. Delete the options that are NOT relevant.]

**Option 1: Responding to Inquiry**

Thank you for contacting us. We have reviewed your inquiry and [provide a concise answer or explanation. Be specific and helpful. If you need more information, clearly state what you need and how the customer can provide it].

**Option 2: Claim Investigation Results**

We have completed our investigation of your claim, [Claim Number]. [Clearly state the outcome of the investigation. If the claim is approved, state the amount and how/when it will be paid. If the claim is denied, provide a clear and concise reason for the denial, referencing specific policy language if applicable. Be empathetic but firm.]

**Option 3: Planned Adjustments**

We are writing to inform you of a planned adjustment to [specify what is being adjusted, e.g., your policy, your account, etc.]. This adjustment is due to [explain the reason for the adjustment clearly and concisely]. The adjustment will take effect on [Date]. [Explain the impact of the adjustment on the customer. If there are any actions the customer needs to take, clearly state them.]

[Regardless of the option chosen, include the following:]

We value your business and appreciate your patience. If you have any further questions or require additional clarification, please do not hesitate to contact us at [Phone Number] or reply to this email.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]

[Your Title]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
